title: Add atomic operations to task manager
description: Enhance scripts/task-manager.py with atomic_status_update() for compare-and-swap status updates and atomic_field_update() for read-modify-write with locks. Prevents lost updates when multiple agents modify same field.
completion_notes: Added atomic operations to task-manager.py including compare-and-swap status updates, atomic field updates, list operations, increment operations, and batch updates
notes: Add new methods for atomic operations to prevent race conditions
